descr.p: Methods for logging, usage data collection, system paths, database and system settings.

element.short: Row height used in Xolmis grids.

element.short: Destroys the settings instance.

element.short: Module that opens when Xolmis starts.

element.short: Use confirmation when cancelling an insert/edit of a record.

element.short: Use Enter key to jump to the next control.

element.short: Flag that indicates if Xolmis was safely terminated.

element.short: Last time the inactive records were permanently deleted.

element.short: Last time a database optimization was executed.

element.short: Last time that Xolmis updates were checked.

element.short: Last path used when opening or saving a file.

element.short: Adjust automatically the grid columns width.

element.short: Use grid columns' conditional formatting.

element.short: Remember the connection used in the last session.

element.short: Allow Xolmis to collect and send anonymous usage data.

element.short: Frequency of automatic backup at Xolmis closing.
